videoData.title: Training teachers: 10 million and counting

nodes.whoTheyAre: As a former middle school teacher and current university lecturer, Shelley Shott takes her knowledge of the educational system to drive development and strategy for K12 education globally at Intel. Her understanding of the impact quality teacher professional development can have on the next generation pushes her passion for working with teachers and education leaders worldwide to help transform classrooms to a student-centric model that prepares kids to be successful in the 21st century.

videoData.description: The Intel Teach program has trained over 10 million teachers who have transferred these skills to 300 million kids in over 70 countries. Shelley Shott charts the impact of this program, sharing inspiring stories of technology empowering both teachers and students to both create opportunity and benefit their communities.
